version_description:
Improved Bokeh
Misc polishes
and added a "please rate us" after you use the app over seven times. And if you're reading this much about what's new, you probably like the app, and it would be great if you could rate us. It will help us get more downloads, which will let us put more effort into updates. If you want to see anything specifically, email at the link on this page and we'll do our best.

- Removed most sounds from U.I.... by popular demand :-)
- Tweeked editing tools
- Fixed rare white line on edge of photo bug
- Updated App text
- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, you probably like the app, and it would be great if you could rate us highly. It will help us get more downloads, which will let us put more effort into updates. If you want to help us improve the app, email your suggestions at the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you!

- Zoom in and out with double taps. By popular demand!
- Three levels of Undo
- Double tap near bottom moves image up to improve edits along bottom edge
- Improved mask resolution for more precision
- Added foreground edge feathering to improve blur transition
- Fixed bug with flash button behavior on camera screen
- Added localizations for multiple languages
- Tightened up and toned down some animations

- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, you probably like the app, and it would be great if you could rate us highly. It will help us get more downloads, which will let us put more effort into updates. If you want to help us improve the app, email your suggestions at the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you!

- Increased resolution option!
- Registered as a photo editing extension so you can use it in other apps.
- Fixed camera screen issues for iPad in landscape orientation.
- Subtle editing improvements.
- Bug fixes

- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, it would be great if you could rate us highly. It helps us get more downloads, which incentivizes us to work harder on these free updates. If you have a specific suggestion, email them to the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you! - Ian

- Fixed an issue where larger images could not be loaded correctly.
- Additional bug fixes

- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, it would be great if you could rate us highly. It helps us get more downloads, which incentivizes us to work harder on these free updates. If you have a specific suggestion, email them to the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you! - Ian

Various bug fixes and improvements

- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, it would be great if you could rate us highly. It helps us get more downloads, which incentivizes us to work harder on these free updates. If you have a specific suggestion, email them to the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you! - Ian

- Fixes black screen bug when taking photos
- Various other bug fixes & improvements

- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, it would be great if you could rate us highly. It helps us get more downloads, which incentivizes us to work harder on these free updates. If you have a specific suggestion, email them to the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you! - Ian

Various bug fixes & improvements

- ... and if you're reading these liner notes, it would be great if you could rate us highly. It helps us get more downloads, which incentivizes us to work harder on these free updates. If you have a specific suggestion, email them to the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you! - Ian
Fixed broken links in the About Us section of the app

Optimizations added to the face detection algorithm

... and if you're reading these liner notes, it would be great if you could rate us highly. It helps us get more downloads, which incentivizes us to work harder on these free updates. If you have a specific suggestion, email them to the link on this page and we'll do our best. Thank you! - Ian

FabFocus 2.0 is a complete rewrite and redesign, with the goal of making it as fast and simple as possible to make stunning portraits. Everything last detail has been considered and refined to streamline the experience.

We hope you love it as much as we do.

For any questions or support issues please contact hello@ghostwheel.org

Added localization for French, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, and Thai.

Fixed some minor bugs and typos
